Text:
Sorry for re-uping this but as stated I will take the other torrent down later tonight..

Seen there was an update to HDDHacker and I figured what the hell and made a new torrent..

Enjoy,
Civic/Scootin

Just some FYI.. If you havent noticed the other torrent is now down..

If anyone has any quiestions on these files Im more then happy to try to help out further..

Later,
Civic/Scootin

Many users have stated (on other places I have posted this) that you will get banned from doing this..

This is not true..
M$ will have no idea that you are using a 3rd party HDD sense the main .bin (or Firmware in this case) is converted to the 3rd party HDD..
Thus you will not get banned from doing a HDD 3rd party swap..

Just wanted to clear this up..

Later,
Civic/Scootin
